snippet: To the Editor:    On March 7, Californians will vote on Proposition 22 (Campaign Briefing, March 1), which says, ''Only marriage between a man and a woman is valid or recognized in California.'' Accepting the diversity of the state does not requir...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: On March 7, Californians will vote on Proposition 22 (Campaign Briefing, March 1), which says, ''Only marriage between a man and a woman is valid or recognized in California.'' Accepting the diversity of the state does not require us to sacrifice the integrity of marriage and family.
abstract: David M Strong letter supports proposition on California ballot defining marriage as union between man and woman (March 1 article)
